```{r, results="asis"}
dataset <- iris
for( i in seq_len(ncol(dataset)) ) {
  cat("### ", names(dataset)[i], "\n\n")
  if(class(dataset[[i]]) == 'numeric') {
    cat(mean(dataset[[i]]),'\n')
  } else if(class(dataset[[i]])=='factor') {
    print(table(dataset[[i]]))
  } else {
    cat('Something Else\n\n')
  }
}
```
